org.omnaest.utils.threads.submit
Interface Waiter<T>

Type Parameters:
T -
All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
public interface Waiter<T>
extends Serializable

A Waiter allows to wait for the results of a SubmitGroup and allows to reduce the result into further forms.

Author:
Omnaest
